Draughts is a two-player abstract strategy game believed to have originated in the middle east. All pieces are laid out in a patterned board with only one vacant point at the center. Each player starts with 12 pieces which are placed on opposite sides. Whites starts first. Players alternate turn to plan. the ain is to capture all of opponent's pieces to win.
